general_advisory: Based on five days weather forecast received from IMD, farmers can continue intercultural operations, harvesting of matured produces and application pesticides mixed with sticker during next five days period as needed. Field preparation should be started for rabi crops. Bunds, channels, uncultivated fields and field roads should be cleaned, by removing weeds. Farmers are advised to transplant mature seedlings (35 -40 days old) of cauliflower, cabbage, broccoli, tomato etc. in raised bed during clear weather. Regular surveillance work should be taken up in all crops in order to know the incidence of various insect pests and initiate the control strategies.

advisory: For neck blast disease management apply Tricyclazole (Beam) @ 0.6 g/l of water (120 g/ac).
To control steam borer & leaf folder spray chlorpyriofos/profenofos @ 2 ml/ l of water.
Spray Imidachloprid @ 0.6 ml / liter of water to control the BPH.
Ear cutting caterpillar: To control, spray Quinalphos 25 EC @ 400ml/acre or Chlorpyriphos 20 EC @ 500ml/ acre at root zone in morning hours.
American Cob Borer: Apply Flubendiamide 39.35 % SC @ 4 ml mixed with 10 liters of water to control infestation of American cob borer.
Present weather conditions are favorable for sowing of Horse gram & Bengal gram.
Taking the advantage of available soil moisture, land preparation and sowing of the crop should be started to get optimum yield.
Suitable varieties: Toria - Anuradha, Parbati, Sushree, Indian mustard - Pusa Bold, Pusa Jai kisan. Seed rate - 8-10 Kg/ha, Spacing - 30 cm X 10 cm.
Spray neem oil 5 ml/ l of water to control insects in mustard & toria at seedling stage.
Go for weeding and apply 26 kg urea and 30 kg MoP per acre at 90 days after planting and apply mulching @ 2 t/acre.

Prepare nursery beds, each measuring 3m length, 1m breadth and 15 -20 cm height. Apply 15 - 30 kg well decomposed FYM and 150 grams of chlorpyriphos dust to each nursery bed seven days prior to sowing. In case of improved varieties, 200 -250 grams of seed is required for one acre area of cultivation and 100 -150 grams of seed is required in case of hybrids.
Cauliflower (60 -75 days) - HYV: Pusa Early Synthetic, Early Kuanri, Kartika, Pusa Dipali, Arka kranti, Arka Surathi, Hybrid: Sweta, Puspagiri, Tusar Goodman etc.

Soil drenching  with 1.25 g Metalaxyl -Mancozeb + 2 ml Quinalphos + 1g Plantomycin per liter of water to control rhizome rot in Ginger.
Remove infected plants from field & burn.
